title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 483.3 - Denial of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 483.3 - Denial of application

State Regulations

In the event that an application for department approval
is denied, the applicant shall be notified in writing, by the department, of
the denial and of the reasons for such denial. Upon request of the applicant, the department may, but is not required to, grant a hearing in accordance with
the procedures under Part 358 of this Title, or may otherwise provide for a
hearing, or for such other review as may be appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
483.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
